name: Old Grumpy
description:
This game was made in a week for the GBJam 8 as a proof of concept, the goal was to see if it was possible to make a procedural generated dungeon game using GB Studio 2.0 Beta.

Goal of the game

Fight your way through the dungeon and find the key to the locked staircase.

Controls

Move Player -  WASD  or Arrow keys

Start Game - Enter

Interact - Z

Attack - X

Known Issues

The music doesn't play correctly.

The monster collision doesn't always work.

Credits

Music Composer

Chase Bethea,  aka Gamer Composer 

Art & Programming

Markus Hannestad,  aka Zipon
